predicate.note: Frames file for 'expunge' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 10.4.1, Framenet entry Removing.

roleset.name: remove

example.name: all args
example.text: Partly because of the show, Mr. Watson says, the district decided not to recommend Mrs. Yeargin for a first-time offenders program that *trace* could have expunged the charges and the conviction from her record.

roleset.note: I also know of a usage which uses just the agent and "source", as in "John expunged his criminal record (of false charges)", which is similar to 'empty' (which actually hasn't been framed yet).
